servinfo.title: Air Fuel Ratio (A/F) Sensor, Heated Oxygen Sensor (HO2S-2) Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Air Fuel Ratio (A/F) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model
Heated Oxygen Sensor (HO2S-2) Heater On-Vehicle Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

attention1.ptxt: To avoid danger of being burned, do not touch exhaust system when system is hot. A/F sensor and/or oxygen sensor removal should be performed when system is cool.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect connector of A/F sensor and/or heated oxygen sensor.
Remove A/F sensor (1) and/or heated oxygen sensor (2) from exhaust No.1 pipe.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following.

item.ptxt: Tighten A/F sensor (1) to specified torque.
Tighten heated oxygen sensor (2) to specified torque.
